author: rwesten
msg: Changed the download location for the OpenNLP models from opennlp.sourceforge.net to a mirror on the IKS dev server (http://dev.iks-project.eu/downloads/opennlp/models-1.5/)
This should solve the issues as discussed in http://markmail.org/message/edsob5xzvaindbrr

author: bodewig
msg: At least for Mono on Linux Type.GetType is always case sensitive on assembly names.  The caseInsensitive flag only seems to apply to the type name.
